alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:59PM EDT until July 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bergen County in northeastern New Jersey... Rockland County in southeastern New York... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 258 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ramsey, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Suffern around 320 PM EDT. Sloatsburg around 325 PM EDT. Monsey and Pearl River around 335 PM EDT. Nanuet around 340 PM EDT. New City and Pomona around 345 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
